Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc19
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc19.View.GUI.SceneController

Class GUIController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc19.View.GUI.SceneController.GUIController
All Implemented Interfaces:
Listener, UI
Direct Known Subclasses:
ChatController, GameSelectionController, LocalStationController, LocalStationTabController, LoginController, NewConfigurationController, OldConfigurationController, PlayerSymbolsController, PlayingAreaController, ReconnectionWaitController, ScoreboardController, SetupController, TableController
public class GUIController extends Object implements UI, Listener
A generic controller for GUI. All scene and sub-scene controllers must extend this class. It implements UI and Listener to interact respectively with LocalModel and ListenersManager

  • Method Details

    • closeWindowEvent

      public void closeWindowEvent(javafx.stage.WindowEvent event)
      This class is uses to create a dialog when a player is in a game, and he presses the closing "X" in the window menù. The dialog asks the player if he wants to quit the game and return to the lobby but keeping the nickname to join another game or if he wants to quit the game and disconnect from the server too.
      Parameters:
      event - a WindowEvent that represent the closing event, so when the "X" window button is pressed.

    • notifyGenericError

    • setBackground

      Parameters:

      isDark - true if background texture must be the darker one

    • notifyPossibleDisconnection

      protected void notifyPossibleDisconnection(javafx.scene.layout.StackPane stackPane)
      Instantiates a ReconnectionWaitController, set opacity to all children of and loads a new reconnection scene.
      Parameters:
      stackPane - the StackPane on top of which put the scene.
